Uses of Class
xtc.tree.Printer

  • Packages that use Printer 
    Package Description
    xtc.lang
    Language-specific support for C and Java.
    xtc.lang.blink
    A debugger contributed to xtc that integrates Java with C.
    xtc.lang.jeannie
    A compiler contributed to xtc that integrates Java with C.
    xtc.parser
    Rats!, a parser generator supporting extensible syntax.
    xtc.tree
    xtc's support for abstract syntax trees and for traversing them with visitors.
    xtc.type
    xtc's representation of types.
    xtc.util
    Utility classes for xtc.

      class  LineupPrinter
      A printer that guarantees that each Node is printed at the exact file, line, and column specified by its location.
